content.text:
# TimedText:Jigoku de Naze Warui sample.wav.en.srt

1
00:00:00,020 --> 00:00:07,100
嘘で出来た世界が 目の前を染めて広がる
Uso de dekita sekai ga me no mae o somete hirogaru
A world made up of lies unravels before my eyes
2
00:00:07,200 --> 00:00:14,100
ただ地獄を進む者が 悲しい記憶に勝つ
Tada jigoku o susumu mono ga kanashī kioku ni katsu
Only those who push through hell will beat sad memories
3
00:00:15,00 --> 00:00:22,080
作り物だ世界は 目の前を染めて広がる
Tsukuri mono da sekai wa me no mae o somete hirogaru
A fabricated world unravels before my eyes
